mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY WHERE CUSTOM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_NO , COMMUNITY_TITLE , COMMUNITY_STORY , COMMUNITY_WRITE_DATE , MEMBER_NO , CUSTOM ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMUNITY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ communityTitle } , #{ communityStory } , SYSDATE , 1 , 1 )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.COMMUNITY_NO , A.COMMUNITY_TITLE , A.COMMUNITY_STORY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.COMMUNITY_WRITE_DATE , C.FILE_NO , C.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , C.FILE_SAVED_NAME , C.FILE_PATH , C.FILE_SIZE , C.CUSTOM , C.THUMBNAILPATH , D.REPLY_NO , D.REPLY_STORY , D.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE FROM COMMUNITY A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_FILE C ON (A.COMMUNITY_NO = C.COMMUNITY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_REPLY D ON (A.COMMUNITY_NO = D.COMMUNITY_NO AND D.CUSTOM = 1) LEFT JOIN MEMBER E ON (D.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.CUSTOM = 1
AND A.COMMUNITY_NO = #{ communityNo } ORDER BY D.REPLY_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CT_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO , COMMUNITY_NO , COMMENT_STORY , MEMBER_NO , COMMET_WRITE_DATE , CUSTOM ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ refBoardNo } , #{ body } , #{ memberNo } , SYSDATE , 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT A.COMMENT_NO , A.COMMUNITY_NO , A.COMMENT_STORY , A.MEMBER_NO , A.COMMET_WRITE_DATE , B.MEMBER_NO FROM CT_COMMENT A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.CUSTOM = 1 AND A.COMMUNITY_NO = #{ refBoardNo } ORDER BY A.COMMENT_NO
